BIOGRAPHY

Salon Ambience by Dasun Menaka De Silva is celebrated for its exceptional bridal and beauty services. Dasun Menaka De Silva, a prodigious talent, has enamored numerous clients with his impeccable style and profound understanding of bridal aesthetics. His journey in the bridal artistry realm began in childhood under the tutelage of his mother, a prominent figure in the industry. With her unwavering support and guidance, Dasun embarked on his path early on, honing his skills and gaining inspiration from mentors like Haris Wijesinghe. Today, he excels as a versatile professional, seamlessly blending roles as a bridal dresser, designer, beautician, and fashion consultant. For Dasun, his work is more than just a career; it's a calling, enriching each bride's special day with beauty and confidence.
Previous slide
Next slide

SERVICES

Previous slide
Next slide
Salon Ambience by Dasun Menaka De Silva understands the profound significance of your wedding day, a moment meticulously envisioned and treasured. With our expertise, we aim to transform your vision into a flawless reality, enhancing your natural beauty and harmonizing it with the elegance of your features and physique. Led by Dasun Menaka De Silva, our team ensures personalized care, acknowledging the importance of every detail in crafting your perfect day. We believe that genuine bridal beauty lies in the seamless fusion of every aspect, resulting in an enchanting harmony that radiates your inner glow.

Our comprehensive services cater to every aspect of your bridal journey

Bridal Dressing: Allow us to transform you into the vision of beauty you aspire to be.
Hair and Makeup: Enhancing the gifts bestowed by nature to accentuate your unique allure.
Retinue Bridal Outfit and Dressing: Entrust us with dressing those dear to you, adding to the splendor of the occasion.
Going Away: Depart in a spectacle of splendor, leaving a lasting impression.
Homecoming: Gracefully enter your new chapter with an aura of sophistication.
Fashion Consultancy: Rely on our expertise to guide you in making style decisions that reflect your essence.
Designing: We tailor our designs to harmonize with your skin tone, face shape, and body, ensuring a style that embodies your true self.

GALLERY

FAQ

Is Salon Ambience Open on Sunday’s and public holidays?

No we are not open on Sundays and Public Holidays. Our opening hours are: Monday to Saturday 9:00am to 5:00 pm.

How can I make a tentative Reservation?

We can do a tentative reservation over the phone. It will only be valid only for one week. Within this week you have to conform the reservation by making an advance payment.

I made a tentative reservation and its almost one week over, how can I book the same date again?

We always advice our clients to book the date as early as possible, we have ‘first come first serve’ procedure. Therefore, after week if someone is ready to pay an advance for the date, we are obligated to book it for them. However in case of such a scenario, we will always call you and verify whether you still need the date. If anyone doesn’t come to book the same date; your booking will remain as it is even if it’s over one week.

Can I get the Quotation over the phone?

Sorry, we do not give our prices over the phone or through email. We will be happy to help you if you come to our Kassapa road office. We will be able provide you with a quotation and any other details. We are open Monday to Saturday 9:00 am to 5:00pm

Do you have a wedding package?

No we do not have any packages; we only have the individual prices.

Do I have to come to your Studio to get dress?

Yes, you have to come to our studio. However, if you require us to come to a place of your choice, we will consider it according to our availability. However this service will be double the price for the bridal dressing.

Do you charge for the appointments?

No, we don’t. You will have to pay advance payment to book the date, we expect you to pay the rest of the amount on the day of the trial, which would be 3-4 days before the Wedding.

Will Dasun come for the Dressing for the Going away?

No, he would not. We will send our assistants to the hotel to prepare you for your ‘Going away’.

Do I need to pay transport for Going Away dressing?

If the location is in a nearby area you will not be required to pay for transport.
